title: A Beautifully Imperfect Life
description: Forced to leave home after a brush with death at the hands of her high school sweetheart, twenty-three year old Melody Sparrow is bruised, battered and scarred. Their once blissful relationship shattered when something inside Brent Daigle snapped, causing an abusive rampage aimed only at her.A year later, Melody is anxious to move forward with her life. Time has healed the external damage, and Melody is given the clear to return home. But she will soon find crossing the state line from California to Oregon could be one of the most dangerous moves of her life.Now, Melody must find the courage within herself to stand against the monster Brent has become.
author: Alexandra  Woods
